name: Road Rash 64
summary: Road Rash 64 is a racing video game developed by Pacific Coast Power and Light and published by THQ for the Nintendo 64. The game is the fifth of six entries in the Road Rash series of video games, the only entry to be published by THQ and the only to be released for the Nintendo 64 platform.
info:
• 中文名: 暴力摩托64
  • 发行: THQ
  • 平台: N64
  • 游戏类型: RAC
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 1999年8月31日
  • 开发: Pacific Coast Power and Light
